articles.title: Change Your Account Settings
articles.intro: Update your name, email, phone number, or password.
steps: Go to your account settings page.
Click 'Edit' next to the information you want to update.
Follow the on-screen instructions and click Save.

articles.title: Reset Your Password
articles.intro: If you cannot log in, you can reset your password.
steps: Follow the instructions to reset it.

steps: Fill in shipment details and save.

steps: Review the list of canceled orders.
